attributes.action: To get the train service back to a reliable service.
attributes.additional_details:
Advertising all over the stations and internet about railplan 2020

Public apology 

We should be entitled to claim more than the pennies delay repay offer you, £500 a month ticket and no trains ! Feel like I’ve been ripped off
attributes.background: Thameslink and Great Northen trains have introduced a new time timetable which increases the amount of train services,  however they did not have enough rolling stock or drivers to provide this. We would like to get a reliable service back in operation or some sort of compensation above delay repay!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We understand that you're concerned about rail services, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign one of these petitions instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/221042
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/220440
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/220962
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/220566
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/206088

You could alsostart a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
